title: Week 10 Quiz: KPIs & Dashboards
description: Assess your ability to analyze financial metrics and trends.

items.explanation: Debt-to-Equity shows how much a company is financed by debt vs. its own funds.

items.prompt: If you are 'almost certain' that something happened in the past, you use:

items.explanation: If you spend more than planned, it is unfavorable.

items.prompt: A dashboard shows a 'Net Profit Margin' of 15%. This is a measure of:
items.explanation: Margins are primary indicators of profitability.

items.prompt: To 'drill down' into dashboard data means to:
options: Look at the data in more detail
Change the color of the graph
items.explanation: Drilling down involves moving from a high-level summary to more granular details.
